resources.string: You have reached your required number of kicks! See you again tomorrow.
You did not reach your required number of kicks and time has run out.
I wasn\'t paying attention. Start over.

What you need to do now is follow all of the steps below. After that you will count kicks again, it is really important you pay close attention. Press the button that says "count kicks" to start counting.

1. Empty your bladder.

2. Drink a glass of ice cold water.

3. Sit down somewhere with no disturbances and concentrate. 

4. Count kicks again.
Authors: Alicia Beckett and Priya\nDeveloper: Alicia Beckett
Purpose of the Application: To help at-risk pregnant mothers in their ability to count fetal movements. Bottom line, to prevent preventable still births.
